songs.title: Score
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Boy let's sweat and I'll work your body, body
I'm on it, on it
All night
When I call the play, you can run it, run it
I love it, love it
All night

[Verse 1]
All stars go far
I let you in my office like a point guard
Pose up, close up
You can make the finals if you play hard

[Pre-Chorus]
You can be my baller baby
Let the game begin
I can be your coach and maybe teach you how to win

[Chorus]
Boy let's sweat and I'll work your body, body
I'm on it, on it
All night
When I call the play, you can run it, run it
I love it, love it
All night

[Post-Chorus]
Pull, up, shoot, score
Make the crowd go wild
Fast, break, back door
Put it up in style
Pull, up, shoot, score
Make the crowd go wild
Fast, break, back door
Put it up in style

[Verse 2]
Half time, you're mine
Meet you at my bleachers kissing courtside
Bench you, send you
Straight into the locker room to quench you

[Chorus]
Boy let's sweat and I'll work your body, body
I'm on it, on it
All night
When I call the play, you can run it, run it
I love it, love it
All night

[Outro]
Ah take it down, take it down
Ah take it down, take it down
Ah take it down, take it down
You wanna score?

Ah take it down, take it down
Ah take it down, take it down
Ah take it down, take it down
You want more?

Ah take it down, take it down
Ah take it down, take it down
Ah take it down, take it down
You wanna score?

Ah take it down, take it down
Ah take it down, take it down
Ah take it down, take it down
You want more?

Ah take it down, take it down
Ah take it down, take it down
Ah take it down, take it down
You wanna score?
